entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Clearing near midnight. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 03 March 2023
